contents.name: ChannelIdentifier
contents.description: Channel definition

contents.name: AccessorySlotIdentifier
contents.description: AccessorySlot definition

contents.name: Powerup
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in its power-up sequence and cannot perform any other task.

contents.name: Operating
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in the Operating mode.

contents.name: Local
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in the Local mode. This mode is normally used to perform local physical maintenance on the analyser.

contents.name: Maintenance
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in the Maintenance mode. This mode is used to perform remote maintenance on the analyser like firmware upgrade.

contents.name: Shutdown
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in its power-down sequence and cannot perform any other task.

contents.name: StreamIdentifier
contents.description: Stream definition

contents.name: AccessorySlotIdentifier
contents.description: AccessorySlot definition

description: Contains a nested state model that defines the top level states Operating, Local and Maintenance

contents.name: SlaveMode
contents.description: The AnalyserDevice is in Local or Maintenance mode and all AnalyserChannels are in SlaveMode

contents.name: Operating
contents.description: The AnalyserChannel is in the Operating mode.

contents.name: Local
contents.description: The AnalyserChannel is in the Local mode. This mode is normally used to perform local physical maintenance on the analyser.

contents.name: Maintenance
contents.description: The AnalyserChannel is in the Maintenance mode. This mode is used to perform remote maintenance on the analyser like firmware upgrade.

contents.name: Stopped
contents.description: This is the initial state after AnalyserDeviceStateMachine state Powerup

contents.name: Resetting
contents.description: This state is the result of a Reset or SetConfiguration Method call from the Stopped state.

contents.name: Idle
contents.description: The Resetting state is completed, all parameters have been committed and ready to start acquisition

contents.name: Starting
contents.description: The analyser has received the Start or SingleAcquisitionStart Method call and it is preparing to enter in Execute state.

contents.name: Execute
contents.description: All repetitive acquisition cycles are done in this state:

contents.name: Completing
contents.description: This state is an automatic or commanded exit from the Execute state.

contents.name: Complete
contents.description: At this point, the Completing state is done and it transitions automatically to Stopped state to wait.

contents.name: Suspending
contents.description: This state is a result of a change in monitored conditions due to process conditions or factors.

contents.name: Suspended
contents.description: The analyser or channel may be running but no results are being generated while the analyser or channel is waiting for external process conditions to return to normal.

contents.name: Unsuspending
contents.description: This state is a result of a device request from Suspended state to transition back to the Execute state by calling the Unsuspend Method.

contents.name: Holding
contents.description: Brings the analyser or channel to a controlled stop or to a state which represents Held for the particular unit control mode

contents.name: Held
contents.description: The Held state holds the analyser or channel's operation. At this state, no acquisition cycle is performed.

contents.name: Unholding
contents.description: The Unholding state is a response to an operator command to resume the Execute state.

contents.name: Stopping
contents.description: Initiated by a Stop Method call, this state:

contents.name: Aborting
contents.description: The Aborting state can be entered at any time in response to the Abort command or on the occurrence of a machine fault.

contents.name: Aborted
contents.description: This state maintains machine status information relevant to the Abort condition.

contents.name: Clearing
contents.description: Clears faults that may have occurred when Aborting and are present in the Aborted state before proceeding to a Stopped state

contents.name: SelectExecutionCycle
contents.description: This pseudo-state is used to decide which execution path shall be taken.

contents.name: WaitForCalibrationTrigger
contents.description: Wait until the analyser channel is ready to perform the Calibration acquisition cycle

contents.name: ExtractCalibrationSample
contents.description: Collect / setup the sampling system to perform the acquisition cycle of a Calibration cycle

contents.name: PrepareCalibrationSample
contents.description: Prepare the Calibration sample for the AnalyseCalibrationSample state

contents.name: AnalyseCalibrationSample
contents.description: Perform the analysis of the Calibration Sample

contents.name: WaitForValidationTrigger
contents.description: Wait until the analyser channel is ready to perform the Validation acquisition cycle

contents.name: ExtractValidationSample
contents.description: Collect / setup the sampling system to perform the acquisition cycle of a Validation cycle

contents.name: PrepareValidationSample
contents.description: Prepare the Validation sample for the AnalyseValidationSample state

contents.name: AnalyseValidationSample
contents.description: Perform the analysis of the Validation Sample

contents.name: WaitForSampleTrigger
contents.description: Wait until the analyser channel is ready to perform the Sample acquisition cycle

contents.name: ExtractSample
contents.description: Collect the Sample from the process

contents.name: PrepareSample
contents.description: Prepare the Sample for the AnalyseSample state

contents.name: AnalyseSample
contents.description: Perform the analysis of the Sample

contents.name: WaitForDiagnosticTrigger
contents.description: Wait until the analyser channel is ready to perform the diagnostic cycle,

contents.name: Diagnostic
contents.description: Perform the diagnostic cycle.

contents.name: WaitForCleaningTrigger
contents.description: Wait until the analyser channel is ready to perform the cleaning cycle,

contents.name: Cleaning
contents.description: Perform the cleaning cycle.

contents.name: PublishResults
contents.description: Publish the results of the previous acquisition cycle

contents.name: EjectGrabSample
contents.description: The Sample that was just analysed is ejected from the system to allow the operator or another system to grab it

contents.name: CleanupSamplingSystem
contents.description: Cleanup the sampling sub-system to be ready for the next acquisition

description: Organizes zero or more Accessory objects identified by 'AccessoryIdentifier' which represent Accessories currently being used on that AccessorySlot.

contents.name: IsHotSwappable
contents.description: True if an accessory can be inserted in the accessory slot while it is powered

contents.name: IsEnabled
contents.description: True if this accessory slot is capable of accepting an accessory in it

contents.name: AccessoryIdentifier
contents.description: Accessory definition

description: Describes the behaviour of an AccessorySlot when a physical accessory is inserted or removed.

contents.name: Powerup
contents.description: The AccessorySlot is in its power-up sequence and cannot perform any other task.

contents.name: Empty
contents.description: This represents an AccessorySlot where no Accessory is installed.

contents.name: Inserting
contents.description: This represents an AccessorySlot when an Accessory is being inserted and initializing.

contents.name: Installed
contents.description: This represents an AccessorySlot where an Accessory is installed and ready to use.

contents.name: Removing
contents.description: This represents an AccessorySlot where no Accessory is installed.

contents.name: Shutdown
contents.description: The AccessorySlot is in its power-down sequence and cannot perform any other task.

contents.name: IsHotSwappable
contents.description: True if this accessory can be inserted in the accessory slot while it is powered

contents.name: IsReady
contents.description: True if this accessory is ready for use
